scripts.dev: bash -lc "PORT=3000; rm -f .next/dev/lock; for _ in 1 2 3 4 5; do PIDS=$(lsof -tiTCP:$PORT -sTCP:LISTEN 2>/dev/null | tr '\n' ' '); if [ -n "$PIDS" ]; then echo "🛑 Cerrando proceso en puerto $PORT: $PIDS"; kill -9 $PIDS; sleep 0.5; else break; fi; done; if lsof -tiTCP:$PORT -sTCP:LISTEN >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo "⚠ No se pudo liberar el puerto $PORT, abortando."; lsof -iTCP:$PORT -sTCP:LISTEN || true; exit 1; fi; PORT=$PORT next dev --port $PORT"
